languages.text: {n}Впрочем, не только кулаки. Еще дробовики и пистолеты, право носить которые вы милостиво даровали им. Ножи и топоры, авторужья, гранаты... Стоит признаться, что на спасательную миссию инфернусы выдвинулись словно на битву.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Впрочем, не только кулаки. Еще дробовики и пистолеты, право носить которые вы милостиво даровали им. Ножи и топоры, авторужья, гранаты... Стоит признаться, что на спасательную миссию инфернусы выдвинулись словно на битву.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you have graciously granted them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The Inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you have graciously granted them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The Inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The Inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The Inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

{n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero sus puños no son sus únicas herramientas. También llevan las pistolas y escopetas que con tanta generosidad les permitiste portar. Cuchillos y hachas, rifles automáticos, granadas... Los infernus han acudido a la misión de rescate como si esperaran una batalla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero sus puños no son sus únicas herramientas. También llevan las pistolas y escopetas que con tanta generosidad les permitiste portar. Cuchillos y hachas, rifles automáticos, granadas... Los infernus han acudido a la misión de rescate como si esperaran una batalla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、武器はそれだけではない。ショットガンやピストルもある。寛大にも彼らに携帯を許可したものだ。ナイフや斧、オートガン、手りゅう弾…インフェルヌスは、まるで戦に行くように、救出作戦に臨んだようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、武器はそれだけではない。ショットガンやピストルもある。寛大にも彼らに携帯を許可したものだ。ナイフや斧、オートガン、手りゅう弾…インフェルヌスは、まるで戦に行くように、救出作戦に臨んだようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们手里的武器并不是唯一的武器。在你的慷慨许可之下，他们还携带着霰弹枪、手枪、战刀、利斧、自动枪、手雷……这些修理工人明明是负责救援的，但看起来就像是来打仗的一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们手里的武器并不是唯一的武器。在你的慷慨许可之下，他们还携带着霰弹枪、手枪、战刀、利斧、自动枪、手雷……这些修理工人明明是负责救援的，但看起来就像是来打仗的一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doch sie sind nicht die einzigen derartigen Werkzeuge. Es gibt auch Schrotflinten und Pistolen, du hast ihnen ja so großzügig gestattet, sie bei sich zu tragen. Messer und Äxte, Sturmgewehre, Granaten ... Die Inferni haben sich für die Rettungsmission ausgerüstet, als würden sie in die Schlacht ziehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Doch sie sind nicht die einzigen derartigen Werkzeuge. Es gibt auch Schrotflinten und Pistolen, du hast ihnen ja so großzügig gestattet, sie bei sich zu tragen. Messer und Äxte, Sturmgewehre, Granaten ... Die Inferni haben sich für die Rettungsmission ausgerüstet, als würden sie in die Schlacht ziehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mais ce ne sont pas les seuls. Ils sont également armés de fusils et de pistolets que vous leur avez gracieusement accordé le droit de porter. Dagues, haches, fusils d'assaut, grenades... Les inferni sont partis pour cette mission de sauvetage armés jusqu'aux dents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mais ce ne sont pas les seuls. Ils sont également armés de fusils et de pistolets que vous leur avez gracieusement accordé le droit de porter. Dagues, haches, fusils d'assaut, grenades... Les inferni sont partis pour cette mission de sauvetage armés jusqu'aux dents.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lakin tek silahları bunlar değil. Cömertlik edip taşımalarına izin verdiğin pompalı ve tabancaları da var. Bıçakları, baltaları, ototüfekleri ve bombaları da... İtfacılar, bu kurtarma operasyonuna muharebeye gider gibi gelmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But they are not the only instruments. There are shotguns and pistols too, which you generously allowed them the right to carry. Knives and axes, autoguns, grenades... The inferni went into the rescue mission as if it were a battle.{/n}
